title: 📊 Market Intel — Sun Feb 15 2026 10:00 PM ET
content:
# 📊 Market Intel — Sun Feb 15, 2026 10:00 PM ET

**Top Headlines: Warner Bros mulls $108B Paramount counterbid over Netflix • Gold hits $5,020 • Dow near 49,500 • Coinbase tanks on Q4 miss but bounces • EU bans destruction of unsold clothing • Google NotebookLM voice theft controversy**

---

## 🔥 Top Trending

- **Warner Bros/Paramount/Netflix mega-deal drama** — WBD board reconsidering Paramount's $108.4B hostile bid (including $30/share + ticking fee) vs current Netflix deal. Activist Ancora Holdings ($200M stake) opposing Netflix deal. Biggest media M&A story of the year.
- **Gold breaks $5,000** — Trading at $5,020/oz, a psychological milestone. Safe haven demand strong.
- **Coinbase Q4 miss** — Wall Street slashing price targets (Barclays, JPMorgan, Benchmark, Clear Street) citing weak retail trading. Shares still rallied despite the cuts.
- **EU bans destruction of unsold clothes** — Massive HN discussion (796 points, 553 comments). Impacts fast fashion/retail globally.
- **Google NotebookLM voice controversy** — Radio host David Greene alleges Google's AI tool cloned his voice without consent. Trending on HN (102 points).

---

## 📈 Stock Movers

- **S&P 500:** 6,836.17 (+0.05%) — essentially flat
- **Dow Jones:** 49,500.93 (+0.10%) — grinding toward 50K
- **Nasdaq:** 22,546.67 (-0.22%) — slight tech weakness
- **FTSE 100:** 10,446.35 (+0.42%) — UK outperforming
- **Nikkei 225:** 56,790.70 (-0.27%)
- **EUR/USD:** 1.1863 | **GBP/USD:** 1.3643
- **US 10Y:** 4.048% (-0.008)

### Notable Tickers
- **COIN** — Q4 earnings miss, multiple PT cuts, but stock resilient
- **WBD** — In play with Paramount $108B bid vs Netflix deal
- **CVNA** — Viral r/stocks bearish DD comparing Carvana to subprime lemonade stand scheme. Bear case: $35-70/share fair value

---

## 💰 Crypto & Digital Assets

- **BTC** — Flat (0.00% on CoinDesk), market "wobbling" as investors "ignore good news, look for exit ramp"
- **UNI (Uniswap)** — +5.4%, leading CoinDesk 20 index
- **BCH (Bitcoin Cash)** — +5.3%
- **Truth Social crypto ETFs** — Filing with SEC for BTC/ETH ETF + Cronos staking fund
- **Stablecoin regulation battle** — Crypto lobby vs Wall Street bankers at White House over yield ban
- **Ethereum Foundation shakeup** — Tomasz Stańczak out as co-executive director
- **DeFi regulation** — DeFi Education Fund urging UK FCA not to regulate non-custodial protocols as intermediaries

---

## 🚀 Tesla / SpaceX / Elon

- No major breaking Tesla/SpaceX news tonight
- Markets watching for delivery numbers and DOGE/government efficiency updates

---

## 💻 Hacker News / Tech

Top trending on HN right now:
1. **"I'm joining OpenAI"** by steipete — 606 points, 441 comments (huge discussion)
2. **EU bans destruction of unsold apparel** — 796 points, 553 comments (top story)
3. **"I fixed Windows native development"** — 680 points, 329 comments
4. **LT6502: 6502-based homebrew laptop** — 316 points
5. **Modern CSS Code Snippets** — 249 points
6. **Magnus Carlsen wins Chess960 World Championship** — 143 points
7. **Show HN: MicroGPT (visualize GPT in browser)** — 121 points
8. **Audio AI: small labs winning** — 111 points (Amplify Partners analysis)
9. **"I gave Claude access to my pen plotter"** — 101 points
10. **Google NotebookLM voice theft** — 102 points

---

## 🦍 Reddit / WSB

- **WSB hot topic: Warner Bros $108B deal** — Paramount vs Netflix bidding war dominating discussion
- **r/stocks viral post: CVNA (Carvana) bearish DD** — "The Lemonade Stand" analogy comparing Carvana's subprime auto loan business to pre-2008 dynamics. Author short CVNA targeting $35-70. High engagement.

---

## 🏈 Sports & Betting

- **NCAA Basketball** — Full Sunday slate, men's and women's games live
- **FA Cup Fourth Round** — Games ongoing
- **LaLiga** — Sunday matches
- **Super Bowl LX** — Upcoming (ESPN promoting heavily)
- **Winter Olympics** — Milan-Cortina 2026 coverage ramping up

---

## 💎 Commodities & Macro

- **Gold:** $5,020/oz (+0.04%) — Above $5K milestone
- **Copper:** $1,211.50 (+0.17%)
- **Brent Crude:** $67.79 (+0.06%) — Subdued
- **Soybeans:** $1,134.75 (+0.15%)
- **US 10Y Yield:** 4.048% (-0.8bps) — Slight decline
- **DE 10Y:** 2.763% (+0.5bps)
- Markets quiet Sunday, watching for Monday open

---

## 🌍 What X Is Talking About

- Warner Bros/Paramount/Netflix M&A drama getting major attention
- Gold at $5K milestone generating buzz
- Coinbase earnings reaction split (bears vs dip buyers)
- Google AI voice cloning controversy trending
- Carvana bear case going viral across platforms

---

*Scanner: Feb 15, 2026 22:00 ET | Sources: Reuters, CoinDesk, Hacker News, Reddit (WSB, r/stocks), ESPN, Yahoo Finance*
*Note: Brave Search API unavailable this run — used direct source fetching*
